duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with multidisciplinary team members to provide age/developmentally appropriate care in accordance with unit standards of care
Communicate clearly and openly with patients and team members
Build relationships to promote a collaborative environment
Look for ways to improve the patient experience
Be engaged and eager to build a winning team

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited school of professional nursing BSN strongly preferred
Current Healthcare Provider Basic Life Support certification
Current Advanced Cardio Life Support certification
Current license to practice professional nursing in Texas or eligibility to do so
